Detailed Description

Interface allowing to select single option from list of options.

Member Function Documentation

virtual int iprm::ISelectionParam::GetSelectedOptionIndex ( ) const
pure virtual

Get selected index.

Returns
index of selected option or negative value if no option is selected.

Implemented in iprm::CParamsManagerCompBase, iprm::CSelectableParamsSetComp, and iprm::CSelectionParam.

virtual const IOptionsList* iprm::ISelectionParam::GetSelectionConstraints ( ) const
pure virtual

Get constraints of this parameter.

Constraints describes some additional information about allowed parameter ranges and related informations.

Implemented in iprm::CParamsManagerCompBase, iprm::CSelectableParamsSetComp, and iprm::CSelectionParam.

virtual ISelectionParam* iprm::ISelectionParam::GetSubselection ( int  index) const
pure virtual

Get subselection for specified option.

Please note, that returned options tree belongs to selection data model.

Implemented in iprm::CParamsManagerCompBase, iprm::CSelectableParamsSetComp, iprm::CSelectionParam, and iprm::CSelectionParamComp.

virtual bool iprm::ISelectionParam::SetSelectedOptionIndex ( int  index)
pure virtual

Set index of selected option.

Returns
true if selection change was possible.

Implemented in iprm::CParamsManagerCompBase, iprm::CSelectableParamsSetComp, and iprm::CSelectionParam.
